name: Team - Portfolio
body:
### Scrum Lords

##About Us 
Our team consists of 5 members.   
[Rob Shea](https://vyper5150.github.io/Portfolio/):guitar:  
[Megan Hendershot](https://MCHendershot.github.io/Portfolio/):jack_o_lantern:  
[Travis Mitchell](https://tmitch15.github.io/portfolio/):rainbow:   
[Moran Chang](https://moranchang.github.io/portfolio/):musical_note:  
[Logan Reese](https://LoganReese.github.io/portfolio/):poop:  

##User Guides  
* [AWS Server Setup Guide](https://github.com/Scrum-Lords/User-Guides/wiki/AWS-Server--User-Guide)  
* [Git/GitHub User Guide](https://github.com/Scrum-Lords/User-Guides/wiki/Git-GitHub-User-Guide)  
* [Java JDBC User Guide](https://github.com/Scrum-Lords/User-Guides/wiki/Java-JDBC)  
* [Linux User Guide](https://github.com/Scrum-Lords/User-Guides/wiki/Linux-User-Guide)  
* [MySQL User Guide](https://github.com/Scrum-Lords/User-Guides/wiki/MYSQL-USER-GUIDE)   

##Team Bulletin Board  
Our team was tasked to come up with an idea for a bulletin board. We decided on a Networking themed board with a guide on how to create your own Ethernet cable from CAT 6.  
![Team Bulletin Board](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Scrum-Lords/Portfolio/master/images/20161107_090014.jpg "Team Bulletin Board")   

##Our most recent team Trello Board (Sprint 3)
Each sprint our team sets up a Trello Board to use as an outline for the sprint. It is a great way to keep your team organized and stay on track.
![Sprint 3 Trello Board](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Scrum-Lords/Portfolio/master/images/Screenshot%20(1).png "Sprint 3 Trello Board")

##Our Sprint 3 program (Sprint 3)
Our team has created a database program that allows the user to input video game data on our server and also retrieve data from the menu.
![Sprint 3 Program](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Scrum-Lords/Portfolio/master/images/Screenshot%20(4).png "Sprint 3 Program")
